title: Are Hardcore Jordan Peterson Fans Reaching Satiation?
description:
We had our second Sacramento Jordan Peterson Meetup last night. It was a great meeting with terrific conversation. One of the big take aways was that we're more interested in meeting together with other fans than paying a lot of money to hear a lecture of most of what we've already heard. What does this mean?

Next Sacramento Meet-up https://www.meetup.com/Sacramento-Jordan-Peterson-Meetup/events/248072576/ 

Links about the Vice interview. https://paulvanderklay.me/2018/02/22/jordan-peterson-vice-interview/
